author: lgo
msg: Don't call the application callback 100's of times while waiting for the
validation results to arrive and the handshake to finish. Cleanup logging
so it's easier to follow the validation.
(do_handshake): Don't retry validation if one is ongoing and the results

author: lgo
msg: Create a larger buffer of outgoing data before encryption to reduce SSL overhead.
(serf_sectrans_encrypt_read): Pass the data in bulk to SSLWrite, so that
encryption can be done more efficiently.

author: lgo
msg: (create_large_request_message): Make the request as large as intended.

author: lgo
msg: * SConstruct: add dependency to AppKit framework.

author: lgo
msg: Reimplement the code to show the ChooseIdentityPanel in Objective C for improved
clarity. Also put the dialog in front and give it the focus.
(showSelectIdentityDialog): New class method, opens the ChooseIdentityPanel.
